Thus , objective study assess effect omega-3 PUFA supplementation lipid profile pro-inflammatory anti-inflammatory cytokine profile chronic Chagas cardiomyopathy patient . After patient selected cardiologist , see study nutritionist , explain study procedure patient administer free inform consent form . The patient agree participate study sign consent form undergo initial assessment . The following data collect evaluated study : sociodemographic data ( age , sex , ethnicity/race , education , domicile ) , clinical data ( functional class vital sign ) , alcoholism , smoking , prescription drug , 3-day food record , 24-hour recall , anthropometric assessment ( height , weight , BMI , waist circumference , tricipital skinfold thickness , arm circumference ) , lipid profile ( total cholesterol , triglyceride , HDL-c , LDL-c , VLDL-c ) , cytokine ( IL-1 , IL-2 , IL-4 , IL-6 , IL-10 , TNF-alpha , IFN-γ , TGF-β ) . Clinical , nutritional , anthropometric assessment take place immediately start intervention 4 8 week study ; lipid profile cytokine evaluate intervention end 8 week . Each patient follow 8 week .
